segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, her attention fully absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the faucet flows endlessly, creating a small waterfall down the front of the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but imagine the mess that will be left behind once she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains so calm, as though everything is just as it should be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, all I can think about is the slippery puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if sheâ€™s ever had a moment where she saw the chaos swirling around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Two children are off to the side, conspiring together over a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR
